entity.name: obs
entity.query: SELECT uuid, obs_id, person_id, concept_id, encounter_id, order_id, obs_datetime, location_id, obs_group_id, accession_number, value_group_id, value_boolean, value_coded, value_coded_name_id, value_drug, value_datetime, value_numeric, value_modifier, value_text, comments, value_complex FROM openmrs.obs WHERE person_id=${dataimporter.request.personId} AND voided=0
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT uuid, obs_id, person_id, concept_id, encounter_id, order_id, obs_datetime, location_id, obs_group_id, accession_number, value_group_id, value_boolean, value_coded, value_coded_name_id, value_drug, value_datetime, value_numeric, value_modifier, value_text, comments, value_complex FROM openmrs.obs WHERE uuid='${dih.delta.uuid}' AND voided=0
entity.deltaQuery: select uuid from openmrs.obs where person_id='${dataimporter.request.personId}' AND date_created > '${dataimporter.request.lastIndexTime}' AND voided=0
entity.deletedPkQuery: select uuid from openmrs.obs where person_id='${dataimporter.request.personId}' AND voided=1 AND date_voided > '${dataimporter.request.lastIndexTime}'
